config.step_question: What is the approximate height & depth of your headlight reflector?
What are your performance vs ease-of-install requirements?
What beam pattern do you need?

lhd.title: Left Hand Drive
lhd.subtitle: (LHD)
lhd.desc: Oncoming traffic drives on the left side of you.

rhd.title: Right Hand Drive
rhd.subtitle: (RHD)
rhd.desc: Oncoming traffic drives on the right side of you.

config.step_question: What is the overall size/shape of your headlight reflector?
config.step_desc: This will give you a good idea what shrouds would look best, but overall, the choice is purely aesthetic. Please note that trimming shrouds in retrofits is very common.

config.step_question: How much light output do you need?
What color is right for you?

K3000.title: 3000K
K3000.subtitle: (Golden Yellow)
K3000.ps: Recommended for fog lights only, the yellow light penetrates through particles in the air more effectively than white light does. Great for driving in rain, snow, and fog.

K4000.title: 4500K
K4000.subtitle: (Warm White)
K4000.ps: Vehicles with factory installed xenon headlights use 4500K. Best for all-season driving (mix of clear and poor weather).

K5000.title: 5500K
K5000.subtitle: (Pure White)
K5000.ps: Our most popular, though slightly less lumens, most people find the increase in contrast at from the whiter light improves overall vision.

K6000.title: 6500K
K6000.subtitle: (Blue Tinge)
K6000.ps: For those looking for a more "stand-out" look compared to stock, without over-compromising the amount of useful light output.

config.step_question: How much light output do you need?
What HID bulbs will you be running with the ballasts?
config.step_desc: This will determine whether you need them for "AMP" or "D2" Fitment
